attributes.action: Band all horse racing including the main one the grand national
attributes.additional_details: Race against there will and end up dying or end up with serious injuries that indicate the rest of their lives, I think it unjust and cruel and I personal think its animal cruelty and being made to race against their will. Humans would not like it if we did the same to them.
attributes.background: This year and the past several years horses have had serious injuries broken bones or die at the scene and have no choice in the matter, the horses are no different to us apart from they don't have a voice to speak up and say. How would humans like it if we made them race against there will.
